mapper.select: SELECT 'PAYMENT' AS TYPE, COUNT(SEL_MEM_NO) AS COUNT FROM PAYMENT WHERE SEL_MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT', COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM PRODUCT WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO} UNION ALL SELECT 'LIKED', COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM LIKED WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}

SELECT MEM_NO , PRO_NO , PRO_VIEWS , PRO_DATE , PRO_CATEGORY , PRO_LOCATION , PRO_NEG , PRO_PRICE , PRO_STATE , PRO_STATUS , PRO_TITLE , PRO_TYPE , PRO_CONTENT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRO_IMG, ',', 1) AS PRO_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STATUS = 'STD1'
ORDER BY PRO_DATE
ORDER BY PRO_VIEWS
ORDER BY PRO_PRICE
LIMIT 30;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING (CHA_MEM1, CHA_MEM2, CHA_LOG) VALUES ( #{CHA_MEM1}, #{CHA_MEM2}, JSON_ARRAY() )
mapper.select: SELECT C.CHA_NO , C.CHA_MEM1 , C.CHA_MEM2 , JSON_SET(JSON_EXTRACT(C.CHA_LOG, CONCAT('$[', JSON_LENGTH(C.CHA_LOG) - 1, ']')), '$.NICK', M.MEM_NICK) AS 'CHA_LOG' FROM (SELECT CHA_MEM1 , CHA_MEM2 , CHA_NO , CHA_LOG , CASE WHEN CHA_MEM1 = #{MEM_NO} THEN CHA_MEM2 ELSE CHA_MEM1 END AS OTHER_MEM FROM CHATTING) C JOIN MEMBERS M ON C.OTHER_MEM = M.MEM_NO WHERE C.CHA_MEM1 = #{MEM_NO} OR C.CHA_MEM2 = #{MEM_NO}
